data.actual_result: The line disappears and then reappears
data.expected_result: The line isn't supposed to flash
data.short_description: On the most recent message in a chat, when hovering over the profile picture, the line in the bottom flashes [90% Zoom level specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a channel - Hover over the profile picture of the person who sent the latest message - Observe the line in the bottom
